org.springframework.binding.mapping.results
Class RequiredError

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.binding.mapping.Result
      org.springframework.binding.mapping.results.RequiredError

public class RequiredError
extends Result

The "required" error result--indicates a required mapping could not be performed because the source value to map was empty.

Author:
Keith Donald

Constructor Summary

          Creates a new required error result
 
Method Summary
 java.lang.String getErrorCode()
          If this result was an error, the logical mapping error code; for example "propertyNotFound".
